}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The FCC ID for this device from the photos provided by Hawking @ Amazon is NDD9578221706. :This FCC ID would not seem to be valid, however, NDD9578221607 is occupied another 8812BU device.
===Drivers=== There are two ''Hawking'' RTL881xAU device noted within ''Hawking'''s drivers... *0e66:0022 (RTL8812AU) - ''Hawking USB Wireless-AC Network Adapter'' *0e66:0023 (RTL8811AU) - ''Hawking USB WLS 11AC Adapter''
Appears to be working in Linux with [https://github.com/MeissnerEffect/rtl8822bu RTL8822BU driver] after patching-in USB device ID.
==Links of Interest== [https://hawkingtech.com/product/hw12acu/?pid=1479&download=HW12ACU_Datasheet.pdf Datasheet]
==See also== *[[Hawking HWUN4]] - 0e66:0020 ([[Realtek]] RTL8192CU) *[[Hawking HD65U]] - 0e66:0023 ([[Realtek]] RTL8811AU)
